formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu dieser Applikation in Asterisk 1.6:

para.screen:
-= Info about application 'ODBCFinish' =-
[Synopsis] Clear the resultset of a successful multirow query
[Description] ODBCFinish(<result-id>) Clears any remaining rows of the specified resultset

formalpara.title: Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.4 zu 1.6:
